urlset:
{{ base_url }} 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/sorting-visualizer 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/cyber-city 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/movie-freaks 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/e-commerce 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/dino-game 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/projects/tower-war 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/blog 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/blog/entries 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/blog/about-us 2022-02-01 weekly
{{ base_url }}/blog/contact-us 2022-02-01 weekly
{%- for entry in entries %}
{{ base_url }}/blog/entries/{{ entry.slug }} {{ entry.modified.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') }} weekly
{%- endfor -%} {%- for author in authors %}
{{ base_url }}/blog/{{ author.slug }} {{ author.modified.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') }} daily
{%- endfor -%} {%- for blog in blogs %}
{{ base_url }}/blog/entries/{{ blog.entry.slug }}/{{ blog.slug }} {{ blog.modified.strftime('%Y-%m-%d') }} daily
{%- endfor -%}
